text.section:
A person may not place or allow to be placed outside of a building or dwelling an abandoned or discarded refrigerator, icebox, or freezer cabinet that:
is in a place accessible to children;
is uncrated; and
has a door or a lock that cannot be released for opening from the inside.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 30 days or a fine not exceeding $100 or both.
